info

Class RelativeTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.RelativeTime

  • public class RelativeTime
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to interpret and manipulate Relative Time field values.

      • RelativeTime

        public RelativeTime(java.lang.String period)
        Construct a RelativeTime instance from the provided string expression. Supported formats include o Relative Time format: DDD:HH:MM:SS[.SSS] o Decimal days: DDD.DDDD
        Parameters:
        period - Relative time expression
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if period is not in a supported format.

      • RelativeTime

        public RelativeTime(java.lang.Double period)

        Parameters:
        period - Relative time in days.
